ConceptDef.label: Sanity Loss
ConceptDef.helpText:
In the Call of Cthulhu series of mods, you may encounter sanity loss when exposed to cosmic horrors or other otherworldly things. To alleviate sanity, one can... 
1. Wait a long time to restore sanity OR 
2. Right click the character to restore sanity at the cost of a mental break OR 
3. Write books or journals at a writer's table or typewriter to alleviate one's mind. 

NOTE: Typewriters and Writer's Tables are available in the RimWriter mod.
